verses.verse: <S%G1909><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Together <S%G846><s%> And <S%G1161><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> John <S%G2491><s%> Went Up <S%G305><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Temple <S%G2411><s%> At <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Hour <S%G5610><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Prayer, <S%G4335><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Ninth; <S%G1766><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> A Certain <S%G5100><s%> Man <S%G435><s%> Lame <S%G5560><s%> From <S%G1537><s%> Womb <S%G2836><s%> Mother's <S%G3384><s%> His <S%G846><s%> Being <S%G5225><s%> Was Being Carried, <S%G941><s%> Whom <S%G3739><s%> <S%G5087><s%> ' They Placed <S%G2596><s%> Daily <S%G2250><s%> At <S%G4314><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Door <S%G2374><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Temple <S%G2411><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Called <S%G3004><s%> Beautiful, <S%G5611><s%> <S%G3588><s%> To Ask <S%G154><s%> Alms <S%G1654><s%> From <S%G3844><s%> Those Who <S%G3588><s%> Were Going <S%G1531><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Temple; <S%G2411><s%>

Who <S%G3739><s%> Seeing <S%G1492><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> John <S%G2491><s%> Being About <S%G3195><s%> To Enter <S%G1524><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Temple, <S%G2411><s%> Asked <S%G2065><s%> Alms <S%G1654><s%> To Receive. <S%G2983><s%>

<S%G816><s%> And Looking Intently <S%G1161><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> Upon <S%G1519><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> With <S%G4862><s%> <S%G3588><s%> John <S%G2491><s%> Said, <S%G2036><s%> Look <S%G991><s%> On <S%G1519><s%> Us. <S%G2248><s%>
And <S%G3588><s%> He <S%G1161><s%> Gave Heed <S%G1907><s%> To Them, <S%G846><s%> Expecting <S%G4328><s%> Something <S%G5100><s%> ' From <S%G3844><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> To Receive. <S%G2983><s%>

<S%G2036><s%> But Said <S%G1161><s%> Peter, <S%G4074><s%> Silver <S%G694><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Gold <S%G5553><s%> There <S%G3756><s%> Is Not <S%G5225><s%> To Me, <S%G3427><s%> But <S%G3739><s%> What <S%G1161><s%> I Have, <S%G2192><s%> This <S%G5124><s%> To Thee <S%G4671><s%> I Give : <S%G1325><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Name <S%G3686><s%> Of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Nazarene <S%G3480><s%> Rise Up <S%G1453><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Walk. <S%G4043><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Having Taken <S%G4084><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> By The <S%G3588><s%> Right <S%G1188><s%> Hand <S%G5495><s%> He Raised Up <S%G1453><s%> <S%G3916><s%> Him And Immediately <S%G1161><s%> Were Strengthened <S%G4732><s%> His <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Feet <S%G939><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Ankle Bones. <S%G4974><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Leaping Up <S%G1814><s%> He Stood <S%G2476><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Walked, <S%G4043><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Entered <S%G1525><s%> With <S%G4862><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Temple, <S%G2411><s%> Walking <S%G4043><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Leaping <S%G242><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Praising <S%G134><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God. <S%G2316><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Saw <S%G1492><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> People <S%G2992><s%> Walking <S%G4043><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Praising <S%G134><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God. <S%G2316><s%>

<S%G1921><s%> And They Recognized <S%G5037><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> He <S%G3778><s%> It Was <S%G2258><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> For <S%G4314><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Alms <S%G1654><s%> Was Sitting <S%G2521><s%> At <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Beautiful <S%G5611><s%> Gate <S%G4439><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Temple, <S%G2411><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> They Were Filled <S%G4130><s%> With Wonder <S%G2285><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Amazement <S%G1611><s%> At <S%G1909><s%> That Which <S%G3588><s%> Had Happened <S%G4819><s%> To Him. <S%G846><s%>

<S%G2902><s%> And As Held <S%G1161><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Who Had Been Healed <S%G2390><s%> Lame Man <S%G5560><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> John, <S%G2491><s%> Ran Together <S%G4936><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> People <S%G2992><s%> In <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Porch <S%G4745><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Called <S%G2564><s%> Solomon's, <S%G4672><s%> Greatly Amazed. <S%G1569><s%>

<S%G1492><s%> And Seeing It <S%G1161><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> Answered <S%G611><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> People, <S%G2992><s%> Men <S%G435><s%> Israelites, <S%G2475><s%> Why <S%G5101><s%> Wonder Ye <S%G2296><s%> At <S%G1909><s%> This? <S%G5129><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> On Us <S%G2254><s%> Why <S%G5101><s%> Look Intently <S%G816><s%> As If By <S%G5613><s%> Our Own <S%G2398><s%> Power <S%G1411><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> Piety We <S%G2150><s%> Had Made <S%G4160><s%> <S%G3588><s%> To Walk <S%G4043><s%> Him? <S%G846><s%>

The <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> Of Abraham <S%G11><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Isaac <S%G2464><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Jacob, <S%G2384><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> Of <S%G3588><s%> Fathers, <S%G3962><s%> Our <S%G2257><s%> Glorified <S%G1392><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Servant <S%G3816><s%> His <S%G846><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> Whom <S%G3739><s%> Ye <S%G5210><s%> Delivered Up, <S%G3860><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Denied <S%G720><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> In <S%G2596><s%> The Presence <S%G4383><s%> Of Pilate, <S%G4091><s%> Having Adjudged <S%G2919><s%> He <S%G1565><s%> To Release Him. <S%G630><s%>

<S%G5210><s%> But Ye <S%G1161><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Holy <S%G40><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Righteous One <S%G1342><s%> Denied, <S%G720><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Requested <S%G154><s%> A Man <S%G435><s%> A Murderer <S%G5406><s%> To Be Granted <S%G5483><s%> To You, <S%G5213><s%>

But <S%G3588><s%> The <S%G1161><s%> Author <S%G747><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Life <S%G2222><s%> Ye Killed, <S%G615><s%> Whom <S%G3739><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> Raised Up <S%G1453><s%> From Among The <S%G1537><s%> Dead, <S%G3498><s%> Whereof <S%G3739><s%> <S%G3739><s%> We <S%G2249><s%> Witnesses <S%G3144><s%> Are : <S%G2070><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> By <S%G1909><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Faith <S%G4102><s%> <S%G3588><s%> In Name <S%G3686><s%> His <S%G846><s%> This Man <S%G5126><s%> Whom <S%G3739><s%> Ye Behold <S%G2334><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Know <S%G1492><s%> Made Strong <S%G4732><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Name; <S%G3686><s%> His <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Faith <S%G4102><s%> Which Is <S%G3588><s%> ' By <S%G1223><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Gave <S%G1325><s%> To Him <S%G846><s%> This <S%G3588><s%> Complete <S%G3647><s%> Soundness <S%G3778><s%> Before <S%G561><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> Of You. <S%G5216><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Now, <S%G3568><s%> Brethren, <S%G80><s%> I Know <S%G1492><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> In <S%G2596><s%> Ignorance <S%G52><s%> Ye Acted, <S%G4238><s%> As <S%G5618><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Rulers; <S%G758><s%> Your <S%G5216><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> But <S%G1161><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> What <S%G3739><s%> Before Announced <S%G4293><s%> By The <S%G1223><s%> Mouth <S%G4750><s%> Of All <S%G3956><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Prophets <S%G4396><s%> His <S%G846><s%> That Should Suffer <S%G3958><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> He Fulfilled <S%G4137><s%> Thus. <S%G3779><s%>

Repent <S%G3340><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Be Converted, <S%G1994><s%> For <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Blotting Out <S%G1813><s%> Of Your <S%G5216><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Sins, <S%G266><s%> <S%G3704><s%> So That <S%G302><s%> May Come <S%G2064><s%> Times <S%G2540><s%> Of Refreshing <S%G403><s%> From The <S%G575><s%> Presence <S%G4383><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%>
And That <S%G2532><s%> He May Send <S%G649><s%> Him Who <S%G3588><s%> Was Before Proclaimed <S%G4296><s%> To You, <S%G5213><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%>

Whom <S%G3739><s%> Must <S%G1163><s%> Heaven <S%G3772><s%> Indeed <S%G3303><s%> Receive <S%G1209><s%> Till <S%G891><s%> Times <S%G5550><s%> Of Restoration <S%G605><s%> Of All Things, <S%G3956><s%> Of Which <S%G3739><s%> Spoke <S%G2980><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> By The <S%G1223><s%> Mouth <S%G4750><s%> , Of All <S%G3956><s%> Holy <S%G40><s%> His <S%G846><s%> Prophets <S%G4396><s%> ' From <S%G575><s%> Of Old. <S%G165><s%>

Moses <S%G3475><s%> Indeed <S%G3303><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Fathers <S%G3962><s%> <S%G2036><s%> Said, <S%G3754><s%> A Prophet <S%G4396><s%> To You <S%G5213><s%> Will Raise Up <S%G450><s%> The Lord <S%G2962><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> Your <S%G5216><s%> From Among <S%G1537><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Brethren, <S%G80><s%> Your <S%G5216><s%> Like <S%G5613><s%> Me : <S%G1691><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Shall Ye Hear <S%G191><s%> In <S%G2596><s%> All Things <S%G3956><s%> <S%G3745><s%> Whatsoever <S%G302><s%> He May <S%G2980><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> You. <S%G5209><s%>

And It Shall Be <S%G2071><s%> That <S%G1161><s%> Every <S%G3956><s%> Soul <S%G5590><s%> <S%G3748><s%> Which <S%G302><s%> <S%G3361><s%> May Not Hear <S%G191><s%> <S%G3588><s%> That Prophet <S%G4396><s%> Shall Be <S%G1565><s%> Destroyed <S%G1842><s%> From Among <S%G1537><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> People. <S%G2992><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3956><s%> Indeed All <S%G1161><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Prophets <S%G4396><s%> From <S%G575><s%> Samuel <S%G4545><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Those <S%G3588><s%> Subsequent, <S%G2517><s%> As Many As <S%G3745><s%> Spoke <S%G2980><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> Before Announced <S%G4293><s%> <S%G3588><s%> These <S%G2250><s%> Days. <S%G3778><s%>

Ye <S%G5210><s%> Are <S%G2075><s%> Sons <S%G5207><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Prophets <S%G4396><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Covenant <S%G1242><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> Appointed <S%G1303><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Fathers <S%G3962><s%> Our, <S%G2257><s%> Saying <S%G3004><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> , Abraham, <S%G11><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> In <S%G3588><s%> Seed <S%G4690><s%> Thy <S%G4675><s%> Shall Be Blessed <S%G1757><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Families <S%G3965><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Earth. <S%G1093><s%>

To You <S%G5213><s%> First <S%G4412><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> Having Raised Up <S%G450><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Servant <S%G3816><s%> His <S%G846><s%> , Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> Sent <S%G649><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> Blessing <S%G2127><s%> You <S%G5209><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Turning <S%G654><s%> Each <S%G1538><s%> From <S%G575><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Wickedness <S%G4189><s%> Your. <S%G5216><s%>
